nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, a Lutrillian was being held as a criminal in the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center, on Coruscant. He wore an orange prison jumpsuit. During a fight between two fellow prisoners—the juvenile Human bounty hunter Boba Fett and the Human Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi in disguise as Jedi killer Rako Hardeen—the Lutrillian expressed his wish for Hardeen to kill his opponent.
